001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.link;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.base.AbstractComponentService;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.base.ComponentType;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.button.ButtonComponentType;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.factory.ComponentFactory;
007import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.log.LogUi;
008import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebDriver;
009import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebElement;
010import org.openqa.selenium.By;
011
012/**
013 * Implementation of the {@link LinkService} interface providing actions for interacting with link components.
014 * Extends {@link AbstractComponentService} to handle operations on {@link Link} components.
015 *
016 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
017 */
018public class LinkServiceImpl extends AbstractComponentService<LinkComponentType, Link> implements LinkService {
019
020   private static final String CLICK_WITH_TEXT = "Clicking link %s with text %s";
021   private static final String CLICK = "Clicking link %s";
022   private static final String CLICK_USING_LOCATOR = "Clicking link %s using locator %s";
023
024   private static final String DOUBLE_CLICK_WITH_TEXT = "Double-clicking link %s with text %s";
025   private static final String DOUBLE_CLICK = "Double-clicking link %s";
026   private static final String DOUBLE_CLICK_USING_LOCATOR = "Double-clicking link %s using locator %s";
027
028   private static final String CHECK_ENABLED_WITH_TEXT = "Checking if link %s is enabled with text %s";
029   private static final String CHECK_ENABLED = "Checking if link %s is enabled";
030   private static final String CHECK_ENABLED_USING_LOCATOR = "Checking if link %s is enabled using locator %s";
031
032   private static final String CHECK_VISIBLE_WITH_TEXT = "Checking if link %s is visible with text %s";
033   private static final String CHECK_VISIBLE = "Checking if link %s is visible";
034   private static final String CHECK_VISIBLE_USING_LOCATOR = "Checking if link %s is visible using locator %s";
035
036   private static final String INSERT_VALUES_IN_CELL = "Inserting values %s in cell for link %s";
037
038   /**
039    * Constructor initializing the LinkServiceImpl with a {@link SmartWebDriver} instance.
040    *
041    * @param driver the {@link SmartWebDriver} used to interact with browser elements.
042    */
043   public LinkServiceImpl(SmartWebDriver driver) {
044      super(driver);
045   }
046
047   /**
048    * Creates a {@link Link} component instance based on the provided {@link LinkComponentType}.
049    *
050    * @param componentType the specific type of link component to create.
051    * @return a new instance of {@link Link} initialized with the provided component type.
052    */
053   @Override
054   protected Link createComponent(final LinkComponentType componentType) {
055      return ComponentFactory.getLinkComponent(componentType, driver);
056   }
057
058   /**
059    * Clicks the link component with the specified type, within a container, matching the provided button text.
060    *
061    * @param componentType the type of the component to interact with.
062    * @param container     the container element holding the link.
063    * @param buttonText    the text of the button to click.
064    */
065   @Override
066   public <T extends ButtonComponentType> void click(final T componentType, SmartWebElement container,
067                                                     String buttonText) {
068      LogUi.step(String.format(CLICK_WITH_TEXT, componentType, buttonText));
069      linkComponent((LinkComponentType) componentType).click(container, buttonText);
070   }
071
072   /**
073    * Clicks the link component with the specified type within the given container.
074    *
075    * @param componentType the type of the component to interact with.
076    * @param container     the container element holding the link.
077    */
078   @Override
079   public <T extends ButtonComponentType> void click(final T componentType, final SmartWebElement container) {
080      LogUi.step(String.format(CLICK, componentType));
081      linkComponent((LinkComponentType) componentType).click(container);
082   }
083
084   /**
085    * Clicks the link component with the specified type identified by its button text.
086    *
087    * @param componentType the type of the component to interact with.
088    * @param buttonText    the text of the button to click.
089    */
090   @Override
091   public <T extends ButtonComponentType> void click(final T componentType, final String buttonText) {
092      LogUi.step(String.format(CLICK_WITH_TEXT, componentType, buttonText));
093      linkComponent((LinkComponentType) componentType).click(buttonText);
094   }
095
096   /**
097    * Clicks the link component with the specified type located using the provided locator.
098    *
099    * @param componentType the type of the component to interact with.
100    * @param buttonLocator the {@link By} locator of the button.
101    */
102   @Override
103   public <T extends ButtonComponentType> void click(final T componentType, final By buttonLocator) {
104      LogUi.step(String.format(CLICK_USING_LOCATOR, componentType, buttonLocator));
105      linkComponent((LinkComponentType) componentType).click(buttonLocator);
106   }
107
108   /**
109    * Double-clicks the link component with specified type, container, and button text.
110    *
111    * @param componentType the component type to double-click.
112    * @param container     the container element.
113    * @param buttonText    the text of the button to double-click.
114    */
115   @Override
116   public void doubleClick(final LinkComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container,
117                           final String buttonText) {
118      LogUi.step(String.format(DOUBLE_CLICK_WITH_TEXT, componentType, buttonText));
119      linkComponent(componentType).doubleClick(container, buttonText);
120   }
121
122   /**
123    * Double-clicks the link component within the specified container.
124    *
125    * @param componentType the component type to double-click.
126    * @param container     the container element.
127    */
128   @Override
129   public void doubleClick(final LinkComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container) {
130      LogUi.step(String.format(DOUBLE_CLICK, componentType));
131      linkComponent(componentType).doubleClick(container);
132   }
133
134   /**
135    * Double-clicks the link component identified by button text.
136    *
137    * @param componentType the component type to double-click.
138    * @param buttonText    the text identifying the link to double-click.
139    */
140   @Override
141   public void doubleClick(final LinkComponentType componentType, final String buttonText) {
142      LogUi.step(String.format(DOUBLE_CLICK_WITH_TEXT, componentType, buttonText));
143      linkComponent(componentType).doubleClick(buttonText);
144   }
145
146   /**
147    * Double-clicks the link component identified by locator.
148    *
149    * @param componentType the component type to double-click.
150    * @param buttonLocator the locator identifying the link to double-click.
151    */
152   @Override
153   public void doubleClick(final LinkComponentType componentType, final By buttonLocator) {
154      LogUi.step(String.format(DOUBLE_CLICK_USING_LOCATOR, componentType, buttonLocator));
155      linkComponent(componentType).doubleClick(buttonLocator);
156   }
157
158   /**
159    * Checks if the specified link component is enabled within the container, identified by button text.
160    *
161    * @return true if enabled, otherwise false.
162    */
163   @Override
164   public <T extends ButtonComponentType> boolean isEnabled(final T componentType, final SmartWebElement container,
165                                                            final String buttonText) {
166      LogUi.step(String.format(CHECK_ENABLED_WITH_TEXT, componentType, buttonText));
167      return linkComponent((LinkComponentType) componentType).isEnabled(container, buttonText);
168   }
169
170   /**
171    * Checks if the link component is enabled within the specified container.
172    *
173    * @param componentType the type of the component to check.
174    * @param container     the container holding the link.
175    * @return true if the component is enabled, otherwise false.
176    */
177   @Override
178   public <T extends ButtonComponentType> boolean isEnabled(final T componentType, final SmartWebElement container) {
179      LogUi.step(String.format(CHECK_ENABLED, componentType));
180      return linkComponent((LinkComponentType) componentType).isEnabled(container);
181   }
182
183   /**
184    * Checks if the link component identified by the given button text is enabled.
185    *
186    * @param componentType the type of the component to check.
187    * @param buttonText    the text identifying the button.
188    * @return true if the component is enabled, otherwise false.
189    */
190   @Override
191   public <T extends ButtonComponentType> boolean isEnabled(final T componentType, final String buttonText) {
192      LogUi.step(String.format(CHECK_ENABLED_WITH_TEXT, componentType, buttonText));
193      return linkComponent((LinkComponentType) componentType).isEnabled(buttonText);
194   }
195
196   /**
197    * Checks if the link component identified by the provided locator is enabled.
198    *
199    * @param componentType the type of the component to check.
200    * @param buttonLocator the locator used to identify the button.
201    * @return true if the component is enabled, otherwise false.
202    */
203   @Override
204   public <T extends ButtonComponentType> boolean isEnabled(final T componentType, final By buttonLocator) {
205      LogUi.step(String.format(CHECK_ENABLED_USING_LOCATOR, componentType, buttonLocator));
206      return linkComponent((LinkComponentType) componentType).isEnabled(buttonLocator);
207   }
208
209   /**
210    * Checks if the link component within the specified container and matching the given button text is visible.
211    *
212    * @param componentType the type of the component to check.
213    * @param container     the container holding the link.
214    * @param buttonText    the text identifying the button.
215    * @return true if the component is visible, otherwise false.
216    */
217   @Override
218   public <T extends ButtonComponentType> boolean isVisible(final T componentType, final SmartWebElement container,
219                                                            final String buttonText) {
220      LogUi.step(String.format(CHECK_VISIBLE_WITH_TEXT, componentType, buttonText));
221      return linkComponent((LinkComponentType) componentType).isVisible(container, buttonText);
222   }
223
224   /**
225    * Checks if the link component within the specified container is visible.
226    *
227    * @param componentType the type of the component to check.
228    * @param container     the container holding the link.
229    * @return true if the component is visible, otherwise false.
230    */
231   @Override
232   public <T extends ButtonComponentType> boolean isVisible(final T componentType, final SmartWebElement container) {
233      LogUi.step(String.format(CHECK_VISIBLE, componentType));
234      return linkComponent((LinkComponentType) componentType).isVisible(container);
235   }
236
237   /**
238    * Checks if the link component identified by the given button text is visible.
239    *
240    * @param componentType the type of the component to check.
241    * @param buttonText    the text identifying the button.
242    * @return true if the component is visible, otherwise false.
243    */
244   @Override
245   public <T extends ButtonComponentType> boolean isVisible(final T componentType, final String buttonText) {
246      LogUi.step(String.format(CHECK_VISIBLE_WITH_TEXT, componentType, buttonText));
247      return linkComponent((LinkComponentType) componentType).isVisible(buttonText);
248   }
249
250   /**
251    * Checks if the link component identified by the provided locator is visible.
252    *
253    * @param componentType the type of the component to check.
254    * @param buttonLocator the locator used to identify the button.
255    * @return true if the component is visible, otherwise false.
256    */
257   @Override
258   public <T extends ButtonComponentType> boolean isVisible(final T componentType, final By buttonLocator) {
259      LogUi.step(String.format(CHECK_VISIBLE_USING_LOCATOR, componentType, buttonLocator));
260      return linkComponent((LinkComponentType) componentType).isVisible(buttonLocator);
261   }
262
263   /**
264    * Performs an insertion operation on a table cell by clicking a link within the cell.
265    *
266    * @param cellElement   the table cell element.
267    * @param componentType the component type within the cell.
268    * @param values        additional values (currently unused).
269    */
270   @Override
271   public void tableInsertion(final SmartWebElement cellElement, final ComponentType componentType,
272                              final String... values) {
273      if (!(componentType instanceof LinkComponentType linkType)) {
274         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Component type needs to be from: LinkComponentType.");
275      }
276      LogUi.step(String.format(INSERT_VALUES_IN_CELL, String.join(", ", values), componentType));
277      linkComponent(linkType).clickElementInCell(cellElement);
278   }
279
280   /**
281    * Retrieves or creates a link component based on the provided component type.
282    *
283    * @param componentType the type of the link component.
284    * @return a {@link Link} component instance.
285    */
286   private Link linkComponent(final LinkComponentType componentType) {
287      return getOrCreateComponent(componentType);
288   }
289}
